REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1974 reute r f BC-FISCHER-WATTS,-HORIZO 04-13 0062

TEXT.TITLE: FISCHER-WATTS, HORIZON GOLD <HRIZ.O> TEST MINE
TEXT.BODY: <Fischer-Watts Gold Co Inc> said it and Horizon Gold Shares Inc have begun sampling their jointlyl-held Rich Hill Placer Prospect mine in Yavapai County, Arizona. The 60-day sampling program begins today and will consist of over 2,000 cubic yards of placer gravels taken from over 40 sample sites. Reuter
